channel.description:

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UC8kw1c.png[/img]
[size=14pt]Media[/size] [SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/chymthA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cJbIuhp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aH9D3a5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j81VavB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VgeqhJr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QDVH5rA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4coRKh7.png[/img]

[B]It's a new public released server everyone so don't be afraid to come check us out! We're a Eco server building a great community. The advertisement speaks big, but if you want to really feel it, come join in for an hour and see how you like it here, you won't regret it[/B]

item.title: Supremescape 718 - New Server May 2016
item.dc:creator: @kennethbp kennethbp
item.description:
@kennethbp wrote:

shapesnatch:

Links dead

Fixed Thank you!

************ UPDATE LOG ************

Staff Update:
Brandon was been promoted to Forum Moderator
(if you need help on forums just message him on forums/Ingame)

added outfit shop
added imp catcher on squeel of fortune

Impcatcher when in your inventory
every npc you kill wether training npc or boss it will give you a random of charm in set of 3

reworked the new players starter options
no more tutorial
no more no life mode ( meaning all will be in regular mode)
reworked the spam private message on starter.
hope this would reduce the blackscreen for new upcoming players.
added turmoil effect on npcs + %, but it doesn’t show on the show stats on prayer (still figuring how to make it show)

reworked the following
drop rates
health
attack damage
damage absorption
(some boss cap damage)
respawn time
of the following boss
King_black_dragon
Kalphite_Queen
Queen black Dragon
General graa’dor (Bandos)
Kree’ra (Armadyl)
Commander zyliana (Saradomin)
K’ril Tsutsaroth (Zammorak)
Nex
Corporal beast
Pest Queen
Glacor
Nomad
Avatar of Destruction
Ice Stikewyrm
Blink
Party Demon
Mercenary Mage
Vorago
Bork
Tormented Demon
Barrelchest
Sunfreet
Dagannoth Supreme
Dagannoth Prime
Dagannoth Rex
Ganodermic Beast
cyclops (mohawk)
Most of Junk and unnecessary drops on the boss listed above is removed , measuring of 2-15 items.
this mean that the drop rates increase from 2-30% or morethan on the boss posted above.

credit: kirito (for helping me get the boss id’s)

Forums update
added forum moderator rank
added donator rank
added supreme donor rank
added extreme donor rank
added pink donor rank
added wizard rank
added sponosor rank

each rank have its own crown , sparkles and color
credit : brandon (for making this rank)

Donation update:
you can now use the following options on donating
Paypal
Visa
Mastercard
american Express
Phone
Bank transfer
and 100+ more options depending on your country.

Read full topic
